channel.title: Legal Proceedings against players
channel.description:
http://services.runescape.com/m=news/bot-busting-update-legal-proceedings
Explains it all, post thoughts below.

item.title: Legal Proceedings against players
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

No shit. I can’t believe some people believed the bot companies

http://www.robotzindisguise.com/forum/forum.php

They survived though…

Read full topic

item.title: Legal Proceedings against players
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:65, topic:421115”][quote author=The Outsider link=topic=523788.msg3812083#msg3812083 date=1321039768]
The people who make the botting client are breaking copyright laws though.
[/quote]

They don’t (or didn’t) have to though.

SCAR for example, does not break any laws. period. But even with java bots they didn’t have to break any laws either.[/quote]
Things like reflection and byte-code editing are more in the grey area, but they certainly aren’t flat out illegal.

Read full topic

item.title: Legal Proceedings against players
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

The Outsider:

The people who make the botting client are breaking copyright laws though.

They don’t (or didn’t) have to though.

SCAR for example, does not break any laws. period. But even with java bots they didn’t have to break any laws either.

Read full topic

item.title: Legal Proceedings against players
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

The people who make the botting client are breaking copyright laws though.

Read full topic

item.title: Legal Proceedings against players
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

You can cheat on runescape without breaking copyright laws. Or any law for that matter.

Jagex’s ToS applys to them and them only. It covers their ass when they ban a paying member.

Read full topic

item.title: Legal Proceedings against players
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

Yes but there’s no denying the copyright part, which is what I keep emphasizing on.

Read full topic

item.title: Legal Proceedings against players
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

The Outsider:

The topic is about “can Jagex sue you?” and you replied to one of my posts “whut”. I have shown material that let’s you all see that breaking the client down and manipulating the game (botting) is against copyright law. The law part is the copyright part, comprende?

I replied to your post because it made no sense.

[quote=“The Outsider, post:50, topic:421115”]I beg to differ. I believe some players will get truly screwed over by Jagex as they won’t know how to properly defend themselves. You must of read the lawsuit document about MITB and this site?

Not everyone will have that knowledge and coolness about them. Especially kids (non-derogatory).[/quote]
So, you’re a lawyer?

[quote=“The Outsider, post:54, topic:421115”]Possibly, but then why announce it like that in front of every one and then back off. To me that is attention seeking, intentional or not.

Jagex are good at announcing something, going back on it, going back on themselves again and then going back AGAIN on themselves…[/quote]
They bluff quite a bit - yes, they can sue a player; they could sue ANYONE for ANYTHING. Whether they WIN or not is a different story.

Read full topic

item.title: Legal Proceedings against players
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:59, topic:421115”]If you read this post, you agree to the terms below:

-You owe jme $120,000
-You owe jme a blow job

If the following demands are not met, you will be prosecuted in court.[/quote]

If you this post the name of ‘jme’ will be here by known as ‘sinisoul’

You also owe me your voids if you read this.

Read full topic

item.title: Legal Proceedings against players
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

If you read this post, you agree to the terms below:

-You owe jme $120,000
-You owe jme a blow job

If the following demands are not met, you will be prosecuted in court.

Read full topic

item.title: Legal Proceedings against players
item.dc:creator: @codyskate5021 codyskate5021
item.description:
@codyskate5021 wrote:

[quote=“Lil Tyrone, post:1, topic:421115”]http://services.runescape.com/m=news/bot-busting-update-legal-proceedings

Explains it all, post thoughts below.[/quote]
kinda struck someone i met like 3 years ago online he was gold farming and selling it on his webs.com thing he is being taken to court for gold farming almost 500 billion
his name is mason felps

Read full topic

item.title: Legal Proceedings against players
item.dc:creator: @Anieli Anieli
item.description:
@Anieli wrote:

Surely the only players they would bother suing are the ones who botted frost dragons 24/7 amoungst other things to gain RSGP to sell?

Plus most of the bots came from China anyway and even if they did get sued the wouldn’t pay :L

Read full topic

item.title: Legal Proceedings against players
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

Yeah, not exactly justice. But sex offenders in your area isn’t Jagex’s problem.

Read full topic

14 registered sex offenders live in my neighborhood
kids getting sued over cheating in a game
wat

item.title: Legal Proceedings against players
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“The Outsider, post:45, topic:421115”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=523788.msg3811616#msg3811616 date=1320979068]
Remember that saying if you argue with and idiot you are an idiot? It applies everywhere.
[/quote]
Copyright does not apply to that. Implying that I’m an idiot, whereas I don’t have to resort to name calling every post I… post. That’s aimed at both of you.[/quote]I just don’t understand why you are going on a topic that is completely irrelevant to what you are posting.

Read full topic

item.title: Legal Proceedings against players
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“The Outsider, post:45, topic:421115”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=523788.msg3811616#msg3811616 date=1320979068]

[quote author=t4 link=topic=523788.msg3811608#msg3811608 date=1320978764]

Think about it and it is.

if you have a fucked up sense of what exactly is protected, maybe.

That’s one of the problems with mankind, we do what the fuck we like and then once we get caught/punished we panic and wonder why. And that’s why our parents told us to think before we act.

You understand once you get a bit older…

you really think cheating in runescape is against the law, huh?

Hit yourself in the head with your palm. I just explained it…

Here’s proof.

These terms and conditions are governed by English law and any dispute connected with them or Jagex Products will be decided only by the courts of the United Kingdom.

You must not reverse-engineer, decompile or modify any Jagex Product client software in any way (except to the extent allowed by applicable law). You must not use a modified/customised version of the client software or attempt to sub-license it. You must not create or provide any other means by which any Jagex Product may be played by others (including, without limitation, replacement or modified client/server software, server emulators).

http://www.runescape.com/terms/terms.ws

It is a licensed trademark and copyrighted, and modifying something that is copyrighted is illegal (shall I say it a third time?).

It also states that a character and it’s items are still Jagex’s, which is a licensed trademark and patented.

most of that is terms of service, which allows them the right to deactivate your account and deny you access to their services.

You must not reverse-engineer, decompile or modify any Jagex Product client software in any way (except to the extent allowed by applicable law). [/quote]Two things, this mainly deals with RSPS-related stuff, secondly notice the bold.
[/quote]Remember that saying if you argue with and idiot you are an idiot? It applies everywhere.

Copyright does not apply to that. Implying that I’m an idiot, whereas I don’t have to resort to name calling every post I… post. That’s aimed at both of you.[/quote]
You don’t really know what you’re talking about, though. You’re placing quotes that don’t really back up your argument at all and are restoring to declaring yourself as ‘older’/‘mature’ and what not.

Read full topic

most of that is terms of service, which allows them the right to deactivate your account and deny you access to their services.
